channel.title: story on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in story on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-15
item.description: Google is building a new augmented reality device and operating system (3 minute read) Google recently hired a lead for its Operating System team for Augmented Reality and posted job listings that indicate that the company is getting serious about AR.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-19
item.description: Facebook’s upcoming AR wrist controllers will hijack your nerves (6 minute read) Facebook Reality Labs (FRL) has unveiled a wrist-mounted controller that reads neural impulses as they travel down the arm, translating them into commands.
